sponsoredLegislation.title: A concurrent resolution directing the Commissioner of Social Security and the Secretary of Health and Human Services to immediately conduct a study and report to Congress on steps which can be taken to correct the benefit disparity known as the notch problem and to finance such a correction, in order to insure equitable and fair treatment for those who have based their retirement plans on benefit levels which have existed for the past decade.
